casebody.data:
DISCRETIONARY APPEALS ALLOWED

98-148. State ex rel. O’Brien v. Powerfone, Inc.

Franklin App. No. 97APC05-639. Sua sponte, cause consolidated with 98-630, State ex rel. O’Brien v. Powerfone, Inc., Franklin App. No. 97APC05-639, and held for the decision in 98-46 and 98-94, Campanelli v. AT & T Wireless Serv., Stark App. Nos. 1997CA00109 and 1997CA00110; briefing schedule stayed.
